name: Band-saws with manual loading and/or unloading for working with wood and material with similar physical characteristics or for working with meat and material with similar physical characteristics

Combined machinery of the types referred to in points 1 to 4 and point 7 of this Annex, for working with wood and material with similar physical characteristics

Falling-object protective structures (FOPS)
Guards for removable mechanical transmission devices

Injection or compression rubber-moulding machinery with manual loading or unloading
Logic units to ensure safety functions
Machinery for underground working
Manually loaded trucks for the collection of household refuse incorporating a compression mechanism
Portable cartridge-operated fixing and other impact machinery
Portable chainsaws for woodworking
Power-operated interlocking movable guards designed to be used as safeguards in machinery

Removable mechanical transmission devices including their guards
